Veronica Isala Eragu Bichetero bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye ọka iwu so na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda maka Mpaghara Kaberamaido kemgbe 2016
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi na onye ndụmọdụ ukwu na EDG Venture Consult, Kampala site na 2007 rụọ Veronica Isala Eragu Bichetero
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1953.
Ọ gara St Mary's College, Aboke maka East African Certificate of Education (EACE), na 1970 na Dr
Obote College, Boroboro maka East African Advanced Certificate of education (EAACE)
N'afọ 1972, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere dị na Uganda na Bachelor of Laws wee nweta Postgraduate Diploma na Legal Practice site na Law Development Centre, Kampala n'afọ 1978.

Ọ bụ Senior Fellow na United States Institute of Peace, Washington DC site na 2011 ruo 2012; Commissioner na Uganda Human Rights Commission site na 2001 ruo 2007; ọ bụkwa naanị onye mmekọ na Eragu & Co

Advocates, Kampala, site na 1998 ruo 2001; ọ bụ Managing Partner & Consultant na Sentinel, Nairobi, site na 1995 ruo 2001; Ọ bụkwa Senior Professional Consultant na UNICEF Eastern and Southern Africa Regional Office, Nairobi, Nairobi, Site na 1992 ruo 1994

Ọ bụ onye nduzi / onye isi njikwa na Apollo Insurance Company, Kenya, site na 1987 ruo 1991; ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa nkwupụta / onye isi nchịkwa na Kenya Commercial Insurance Corporation site na 1983 ruo 1987; yana dịka onye ọrụ iwu na Rhodes & Rhodes, Lagos, Nigeria, site na 1980 ruo 1981; na dị ka odeakwụkwọ iwu na National Insurance Corporation, Uganda, site na 1976 ruo 1980
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndị omeiwu na Uganda ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye dị otú ahụ site na 2016 ruo ugbu a.
E wezụga ọrụ ya dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu Uganda, ọ na-anọdụ na kọmitii ndị omeiwu na-esonụ:
